meanings.sent1: She will probably arrive on time for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: It will probably rain later today.
meanings.sent3: The cat will probably try to steal the fish again.
meanings.sent4: His prediction was probably as accurate as a broken clock.
meanings.sent5: The sun will probably rise in the east tomorrow.

meanings.sent1: He is probably the one who took my pen.
meanings.sent2: They probably already left for the airport.
meanings.sent3: The cake will probably disappear before the party starts.
meanings.sent4: Her smile probably shines brighter than the stars.
meanings.sent5: The answer to the riddle is probably hidden in plain sight.
